Was it strange?\""},{"lineNumber":156708,"originalJapaneseLine":"「変……ではあったけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It was strange... but..."},{"lineNumber":156709,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いえ、真に迫っていて良かったと思うわよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, I think it was convincing and good.\""},{"lineNumber":156710,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、良かった……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, that's a relief...\""},{"lineNumber":156711,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほうと胸を撫で下ろす火炎書士と対照的に、","translatedEnglishLine":"The Flame Scribe sighed in relief, contrasting with"},{"lineNumber":156712,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウゼルが重々しい溜め息を吐き出す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Howser, who let out a heavy sigh."},{"lineNumber":156713,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それにしても……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even so..."},{"lineNumber":156714,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まさか私がケイブリスの部下として","translatedEnglishLine":"I never imagined that I, as a subordinate of Kebliss,"},{"lineNumber":156715,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人類と戦うことになるなんて……","translatedEnglishLine":"would end up fighting against humanity...\""},{"lineNumber":156716,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、これでもマシな扱いなのよね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, this is still relatively better treatment.\""},{"lineNumber":156717,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もしも火炎がケイブリス派と内通を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If Flame had not secretly collaborated with the Kebliss faction,"},{"lineNumber":156718,"originalJapaneseLine":"　取っていなかったら今頃どうなっていたか","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder what would have happened by now.\""},{"lineNumber":156719,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こちらからは大して有益な情報は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We haven't provided much useful information,"},{"lineNumber":156720,"originalJapaneseLine":"　出していなかったのですが、","translatedEnglishLine":"from our side, however,"}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: す、すみません、もう一度……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "S-sorry, could you say that again...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士は鎖を引っ張り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Scribe pulled on the chain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルを連れて無言で退室した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and silently left the room with Howser.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぷはぁ、緊張しました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew, that was nerve-wracking..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後なんと言ったんでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder what exactly was said at the end."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言った通りだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly as I said."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「望みは血と死だけ、だとよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Their wish is for nothing but blood and death..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひぇぇぇ……」
「まったく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good grief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんと得体の知れん奴だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What a mysterious, unfathomable guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「使徒が魔人を従えるなど、前代未聞です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "An apostle commanding a demon? That's unheard of."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしかしたらあの使徒、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maybe that apostle is far more terrifying than the demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人よりよっぽど恐ろしいやも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed, far more frightening than the demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は魔物隊長の言葉を否定できなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Monster General could not deny the Monster Captain's words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テント内を出て、二人が戦場を目指す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They exited the tent and the two headed towards the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首に繋げられた鎖はジャラリと重く鳴り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The chain attached to the neck clinked heavily,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自然とハウゼルの顔を俯かせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Howser naturally lowered his face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと気づくと火炎書士の体が小刻みに震えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, Howser noticed the Flame Scribe’s body was trembling slightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウ、ウ、ウ……ウウウエウウウ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "U-u-u... uuueuuu...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お疲れ様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もういいわよ、火炎書士」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's enough, Flame Scribe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はううううう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hauuuuu..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こ、怖かったですぅ……ハウゼル様ぁぁぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-it was so scary... Master Howser..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまでと全く違う、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a voice completely different from before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 若々しい少女の声で火炎書士が泣き言を吐く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Flame Scribe whined in a youthful girl's voice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、すみませんっ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, sorry about that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、首輪外しますね、ハウゼル様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll take off the collar now, Master Howser."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士が甲斐甲斐しくハウゼルの首輪を外す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Scribe diligently removed Howser's collar.
"Phew..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだか……いつも悪いわね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow... I always feel bad...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍との交渉役、やってもらって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having you take care of the negotiations with the Monster General."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、いいえ、なんのこれしき、です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no, it's nothing at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士が両手を胸の前でグッと握る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Scribe clenched both hands firmly over her chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……怖いですけど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I'm scared, but.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも頑張ります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll do my best."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come to think of it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっきのあの口調……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that tone you used earlier...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、舐められたらいけないかなって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I thought I shouldn't be underestimated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと演技を……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I acted a little bit...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれ？　変でした？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? Was it strange?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「変……ではあったけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was strange... but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、真に迫っていて良かったと思うわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I think it was convincing and good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、良かった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that's a relief..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほうと胸を撫で下ろす火炎書士と対照的に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Scribe sighed in relief, contrasting with

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルが重々しい溜め息を吐き出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howser, who let out a heavy sigh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それにしても……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか私がケイブリスの部下として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never imagined that I, as a subordinate of Kebliss,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類と戦うことになるなんて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: would end up fighting against humanity..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、これでもマシな扱いなのよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this is still relatively better treatment."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしも火炎がケイブリス派と内通を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If Flame had not secretly collaborated with the Kebliss faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取っていなかったら今頃どうなっていたか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder what would have happened by now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらからは大して有益な情報は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We haven't provided much useful information,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出していなかったのですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from our side, however,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: す、すみません、もう一度……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "S-sorry, could you say that again...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士は鎖を引っ張り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Scribe pulled on the chain,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルを連れて無言で退室した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and silently left the room with Howser.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぷはぁ、緊張しました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Phew, that was nerve-wracking..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後なんと言ったんでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder what exactly was said at the end."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「言った通りだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly as I said."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「望みは血と死だけ、だとよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Their wish is for nothing but blood and death..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひぇぇぇ……」
「まったく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good grief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんと得体の知れん奴だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What a mysterious, unfathomable guy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「使徒が魔人を従えるなど、前代未聞です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "An apostle commanding a demon? That's unheard of."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしかしたらあの使徒、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maybe that apostle is far more terrifying than the demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人よりよっぽど恐ろしいやも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed, far more frightening than the demons..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は魔物隊長の言葉を否定できなかった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Monster General could not deny the Monster Captain's words.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テント内を出て、二人が戦場を目指す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They exited the tent and the two headed towards the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首に繋げられた鎖はジャラリと重く鳴り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The chain attached to the neck clinked heavily,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自然とハウゼルの顔を俯かせた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Howser naturally lowered his face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと気づくと火炎書士の体が小刻みに震えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suddenly, Howser noticed the Flame Scribe’s body was trembling slightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ウ、ウ、ウ……ウウウエウウウ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "U-u-u... uuueuuu...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お疲れ様。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good work.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もういいわよ、火炎書士」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's enough, Flame Scribe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はううううう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hauuuuu..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こ、怖かったですぅ……ハウゼル様ぁぁぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-it was so scary... Master Howser..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまでと全く違う、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a voice completely different from before,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 若々しい少女の声で火炎書士が泣き言を吐く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Flame Scribe whined in a youthful girl's voice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、すみませんっ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, sorry about that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、首輪外しますね、ハウゼル様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll take off the collar now, Master Howser."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士が甲斐甲斐しくハウゼルの首輪を外す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Scribe diligently removed Howser's collar.
"Phew..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだか……いつも悪いわね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow... I always feel bad...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍との交渉役、やってもらって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having you take care of the negotiations with the Monster General."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「い、いいえ、なんのこれしき、です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no, it's nothing at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火炎書士が両手を胸の前でグッと握る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Scribe clenched both hands firmly over her chest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……怖いですけど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I'm scared, but.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でも頑張ります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll do my best."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そういえば……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come to think of it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっきのあの口調……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that tone you used earlier...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、舐められたらいけないかなって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, I thought I shouldn't be underestimated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっと演技を……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I acted a little bit...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれ？　変でした？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? Was it strange?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「変……ではあったけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It was strange... but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、真に迫っていて良かったと思うわよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I think it was convincing and good."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、良かった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, that's a relief..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほうと胸を撫で下ろす火炎書士と対照的に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Flame Scribe sighed in relief, contrasting with

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウゼルが重々しい溜め息を吐き出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howser, who let out a heavy sigh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それにしても……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even so...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか私がケイブリスの部下として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never imagined that I, as a subordinate of Kebliss,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類と戦うことになるなんて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: would end up fighting against humanity..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、これでもマシな扱いなのよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, this is still relatively better treatment."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしも火炎がケイブリス派と内通を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If Flame had not secretly collaborated with the Kebliss faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取っていなかったら今頃どうなっていたか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder what would have happened by now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらからは大して有益な情報は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We haven't provided much useful information,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 出していなかったのですが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from our side, however,
